channel.title: CVE Feed for YMC -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for YMC -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-39665|2024-08-02T18:18:42.177Z -- ymc -- filter%20%26%20grids
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in YMC Filter & Grids allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Filter & Grids: from n/a through 2.9.2.
